text: "Mother Nature" is a 1972 R&B; single by The Temptations. It was written by Nick Zesses and Dino Fekaris and produced by Norman Whitfield, and was the first single on their album All Directions. It was a top 30 hit on the R&B; charts at number 27, but failed to make an impact on the pop charts, peaking at only number 92.Williams, Otis and Weigner, Harry (2002). My Girl: The Very Best of the Temptations (Compact disc liner notes). New York: Motown/Universal Records.Allmusic ==Personnel== * Lead vocals by Dennis Edwards * Background vocals by Damon Harris, Richard Street, Otis Williams and Melvin Franklin * Instrumentation by The Funk Brothers ==References== Category:Song recordings produced by Norman Whitfield Category:The Temptations songs Category:Gordy Records singles Category:1972 singles Category:Songs written by Dino Fekaris Category:1972 songs
title: Mother Nature (The Temptations song)
